name: SCRAP (itch) (Vorac Design)
description:
A small project in which you play as a small engineer and her cute drone. With the ability to shift into different parts, the drone can help you move around the level to achieve the finish line.

Currently in a prototype stage Controls:

Move1: [←] [↑] [→] [↓]
Move2: [W] [S] [A] [D]
Move3: [SPACE] [CTRL]

Switch Character: [Q]

Change Drone Stage: [1] [2] [3]
